name: Crossbar Challenge 2022
description:
You are an upcoming teenage youtuber from a small island. Recently your FIFA pack opening videos have been stinky and most are getting demonetized. You're running low on money. You even sold your sister on the dark web for FIFA points.

Your drug dealer is threatening to snitch out on your "fake pack opening reactions" if you don't pay off your debt. Your only hope is to make a classic "Crossbar Challenge" video and hope it goes viral.

The bar indicates the magnitude of the shot parameter increasing from left to right. Press the 'GO' button to set the Direction, Height and Power of shot. Setting the magnitude in the green area increases the chance of success.

Hitting the side post will get you 500,000 views and hitting the crossbar clean will get you 2,000,000 views along with a sick dubstep beat drop. Get over 10 million views in 10 attempts to win.

This is basically a parody of the crossbar challenge videos in YouTube(KSI/W2S).

This game is fully free and not monetized in any way. If you like it and want more similar games, please follow me here on https://brobingames.itch.io/ or https://twitter.com/BrobinGames and let me know.
